content: 24 30 sts remain row 21 *k1 2 3 k2tog 12 18 24 sts remain baby size only row 23 *k2tog 6 sts remain cut yarn and string through remaining sts and secure sew in loose threads and lightly block toddler & child size row 23 *k1 2 k2tog 12 18 sts remain toddler size only row 25 *k2tog 6 sts remain cut yarn and string through remaining sts and secure sew in loose threads and lightly block child size row 25 k1 k2tog 12 sts remain row 27 *k2tog 6 sts remain cut yarn and string through remaining sts and secure sew in loose threads and lightly block optional with scrap yarn create and attach tassel at end i recommended youtube com for a variety of helpful videos if you are not sure how to make and attach a tassel tassel shown is 4 inches in length wolf and faun knits copyright 2015 natalie raedwulf all rights reserved this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only questions or comments please email me at n raedwulf@gmail com
